verses.text: Those whose hope \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \w which|strong="H2022"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* keeps \w its|strong="H3808"\w* place \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w As|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w so|strong="H6258"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H6258"\w* \w time|strong="H6258"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* sinners \w will|strong="H6662"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w resting|strong="H5117"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* heritage \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* upright; \w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* upright \w may|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w evil|strong="H7562"\w*.

Do \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3826"\w*.

\w But|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* such \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w turned|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* straight \w way|strong="H5921"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* take \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w away|strong="H5186"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w evil|strong="H0205"\w*. \w Let|strong="H5186"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
